languages.text: {n}Тело женщины не несет никаких следов внешних повреждений, оно изувечено изнутри — ее плоть будто бы трансмутировала в металлические формы, которые разорвали острыми углами кожу, превратили внутренние органы в кровоточащее решето. Часть ее костей, зияющих в ранах, отблескивает металлом, другие сохранили прежнюю форму.{/n}

{n}Her body does not appear to have any external injuries — it has been maimed from the inside out. It is as if her flesh was transmuted into metallic shapes that then burst out of her skin and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her exposed bones have a metallic gleam to them, while others still look natural.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тело женщины не несет никаких следов внешних повреждений, оно изувечено изнутри — ее плоть будто бы трансмутировала в металлические формы, которые разорвали острыми углами кожу, превратили внутренние органы в кровоточащее решето. Часть ее костей, зияющих в ранах, отблескивает металлом, другие сохранили прежнюю форму.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Her body does not appear to have any external injuries — it is maimed from inside: her flesh seems to have transmutated into metallic shapes that cut her skin from the inside and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her bones, gaping from the deep wounds, have a metallic gleam to them, and the others still have their original shape.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: {n}Her body does not appear to have any external injuries — it is maimed from inside: her flesh seems to have transmutated into metallic shapes that cut her skin from the inside and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her bones, gaping from the deep wounds, have a metallic gleam to them, and the others still have their original shape.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tanakia

Some of her bones, gaping from the deep wounds, have a metallic gleam to them, and others still have their original shape.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tanakia

Some of her bones, gaping from the deep wounds, have a metallic gleam to them, and others still have their original shape.{/n}

It is as if her flesh was transmuted into metallic shapes that then burst out of her skin and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her exposed bones have a metallic gleam to them, while others still look natural.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tanakia

traits.locale_text: {n}Her body does not appear to have any external injuries — it has been maimed from the inside out. It is as if her flesh was transmuted into metallic shapes that then burst out of her skin and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her exposed bones have a metallic gleam to them, while others still look natural.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}Son corps ne présente pas de blessures externes apparentes, mais a été mutilé de l'intérieur. Sa chair semble s'être transmutée en formes métalliques qui ont ensuite jailli à travers sa peau et transpercé ses organes internes de part en part. Certains de ses os mis à nu ont un éclat métallique, tandis que d'autres ont gardé leur aspect naturel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her body does not appear to have any external injuries — it has been maimed from the inside out. It is as if her flesh was transmuted into metallic shapes that then burst out of her skin and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her exposed bones have a metallic gleam to them, while others still look natural.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Son corps ne présente pas de blessures externes apparentes, mais a été mutilé de l'intérieur. Sa chair semble s'être transmutée en formes métalliques qui ont ensuite jailli à travers sa peau et transpercé ses organes internes de part en part. Certains de ses os mis à nu ont un éclat métallique, tandis que d'autres ont gardé leur aspect naturel.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}Su cuerpo no parece presentar lesiones externas, el daño es más bien interno: su carne se había transmutado en piezas metálicas que perforaban su piel desde dentro para salir, tornando sus órganos en un colador sangriento. Algunos de sus huesos, ahora expuestos, poseen un brillo metálico, mientras que otros aún conservan su aspecto original.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her body does not appear to have any external injuries — it has been maimed from the inside out. It is as if her flesh was transmuted into metallic shapes that then burst out of her skin and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her exposed bones have a metallic gleam to them, while others still look natural.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su cuerpo no parece presentar lesiones externas, el daño es más bien interno: su carne se había transmutado en piezas metálicas que le cortaban la piel desde dentro y tornaban sus órganos en un colador sangriento. Algunos de sus huesos, astillados por las profundas heridas, poseen un brillo metálico y otros aún conservan su forma original.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}她的身体似乎并没有受到任何外部伤害，所有的伤害都来自身体内部。她起来就像是血肉变成了金属的形状，从内部切开了她的皮肤，把她的内脏刺成了到处冒血的筛子。一部分裸露在外的骨骼泛着金属的光泽，另一部分骨骼依然保持着原本的样子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her body does not appear to have any external injuries — it has been maimed from the inside out. It is as if her flesh was transmuted into metallic shapes that then burst out of her skin and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her exposed bones have a metallic gleam to them, while others still look natural.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她的身体似乎并没有受到任何外部伤害，所有的伤害都来自身体内部。她的血肉似乎变成了金属的形状，从内部切开了她的皮肤，把她的内脏刺成了到处冒血的筛子。她的一部分骨头被深深的伤口撕裂了，泛着金属的光泽，另一部分骨头依然保持着原有的形状。{/n}
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}彼女の身体に外傷は見当たらなかった。その身体は内側より傷つけられていた。まるで肉体が金属的な形に変質し、内側から皮膚を切り裂き、内臓を血まみれのふるいに変えたようだ。露出した骨の一部は金属的な輝きを放つものもあれば、まだ元の形をしているものも残っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her body does not appear to have any external injuries — it has been maimed from the inside out. It is as if her flesh was transmuted into metallic shapes that then burst out of her skin and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her exposed bones have a metallic gleam to them, while others still look natural.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の身体に外傷は見当たらなかった。その身体は内側より傷つけられていた。まるで肉体が金属的な形に変質し、内側から皮膚を切り裂き、内臓を血まみれのふるいに変えたようだ。露出した骨の一部は金属的な輝きを放つものもあれば、まだ元の形をしているものも残っていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}Ihr Körper scheint keine äußerlichen Verletzungen aufzuweisen ... er wurde offenbar von innen verstümmelt. Es scheint, als hätte sich ihr Fleisch in metallische Gebilde verwandelt, die ihre Haut durchstießen und ihre inneren Organe in ein blutiges Sieb verwandelten. Während einige ihrer freiliegenden Knochen metallisch schimmern, sehen andere ganz normal aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her body does not appear to have any external injuries — it has been maimed from the inside out. It is as if her flesh was transmuted into metallic shapes that then burst out of her skin and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her exposed bones have a metallic gleam to them, while others still look natural.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihr Körper scheint keine äußerlichen Verletzungen aufzuweisen. Er ist von innen heraus verstümmelt. Ihr Fleisch ist offenbar zu metallischen Formen mutiert, die ihre Haut von innen heraus aufgeschnitten und ihre inneren Organe in ein blutiges Sieb verwandelt haben. Einige ihrer Knochen, die aus den tiefen Wunden hervorragen, glänzen metallisch. Andere haben noch ihre ursprüngliche Gestalt.{/n}
traits.speaker: Tanakia

languages.text: {n}Bedeninde dış yaralanmalar görülmüyor, içinden yaralanmış. Sanki eti metalik şekillere dönüşüp derisini yırtmış ve iç organlarını kanlı bir süzgece çevirmiş gibi. Görünen kemiklerinden bazılarında metalik bir parlama var, diğerleriyse hâlâ doğal gözüküyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Her body does not appear to have any external injuries — it has been maimed from the inside out. It is as if her flesh was transmuted into metallic shapes that then burst out of her skin and turned her internal organs into a bloody sieve. Some of her exposed bones have a metallic gleam to them, while others still look natural.{/n}
